artist: Artist: Alfred Jarry; Author: Music by Claude Terrasse; Publisher: Edition du Mercure de France, Paris , for the Repertoire des Pantins
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Illustrated album of music by Claude Terrasse for the Repertoire des Pantins (Theatre des Pantins), a puppet theater founded in Paris in 1898 by Alfred Jarry, Franc-Nohain, and Claude Terrasse; 10 pp.
title: Polish March
